body: Huggybaby posted @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=3735&p=75453#p75453 I couldn't play my Basilisk Collar on my opponent's Keening Banshee. So I took control of it with Mark of Mutiny. At the end of my turn when control reverted, the artifact stayed on the creature and I was unable to reattach the Basilisk Collar to one of my creatures.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: unable to reattach equipment after control reverted

comments.body: I think this is correct behavior. The equipment stays attached to Keening Banshee until the owner of the equipment decides to attach it to another creature. I did a test and was able to equip Basilisk Collar once it was my turn again.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
I'm closing this because every relevant info I can find about the above situation suggests that the current behavior is the right one.
